title: Pet Friendly, Remodeled Apartment with a Washer and Dryer
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Americana Apartments in Rohnert Park is the perfect location in beautiful Sonoma County.
We are just minutes away from Highway 101, Sonoma State University, Santa Rosa JC, great schools, shopping, banking, entertainment, world-class wineries, breweries, restaurants and more!
Enjoy beautifully landscaped grounds, 24-hour laundry facility and fitness center.
You are surrounded by the Majestic Rolling Hills and beautiful Redwood Trees.
At Americana, you'll have it all!
Choose our 1 bedroom apartment home or the two bedroom townhome.
Many of our apartment homes are newly renovated with a modern prospective!
However, we still have a few homes available with a Classic flair!
Wouldn't you just love to become one of our neighbors?
Americana is where comfort meets community!
***Pricing subject to certain units only and reflects concession amortized over 12 months***
Pets are welcome at Americana Apartments with a 2 pet maximum and total weight under 100 lbs.
Breed restrictions apply with a $500 deposit and $50 monthly pet rent.
Month to month None,6 months,9+ months,12+ months
Now offering in unit washers and dryers along with flexible lease terms.
$53.33 per applicant over the age of 18
Water, Sewage, Garbage, All utilities paid for by resident
24 hour Laundry facility, Available in unit on selected homes
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven, Stainless steele appliances
Fitness center, 24 hour on site Laundry facility
Vaulted ceiling, Non-Smoking Property, Vinyl plank flooring, Upgraded modern light fixtures
